definition: to shed tears/to be all in tears
to wave/to brandish/to command/to conduct/to scatter/to disperse

sentences.english: The moment the son was about to go aboard ship , they kissed good - bye with tears.
sentences.chinese: 孩子马上就要登上去国外的船，他们挥泪吻别。

sentences.english: As a revenge, the chance will tear itself away from your side.
sentences.chinese: 若是为了复仇的话，机会会从你身边挥泪离开的。

definition: reluctant to part (idiom); broken-hearted at having to leave
to take one's leave/to bid farewell
to bid farewell/to part (usually with little hope of meeting again)
to weep disconsolately/to cry on each other's shoulder
reluctant to part with (sth or sb)/unwilling to let go of
precious/extremely valuable/(honorific) Please take good care of yourself!
to bury one's head in one's hands and weep (idiom)
